api_description: A calculator implemented using a Python shell. Remember to print out the answer with `print(...)` at the end of your query

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: a valid python command. you should print the output with `print(...)` at the end of the command.

api_description: execute Python expressions with Python Interpreter, can be used as a simple calculator e.g., "(123 + 234) / 23 * 19".

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: a valid python command. you should print the output with `print(...)` at the end of the command.

api_description: Access computation, math data through Wolfram|Alpha and Wolfram Language.

required_parameters.name: input
required_parameters.description: input in natural language to get WolframAlpha results

api_description: BingSearch can search for rich external knowledge on the Internet based on keywords, which can compensate for knowledge fallacy and knowledge outdated.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: query used to search on the Internet. Should be specific and precise with your query to increase the chances of getting relevant results.
